conbody.p:
provides the following plug-ins:
org.dita-semia.resolver
This plug-in contains a preprocess resolver, sample use cases, and java source code for DITA-OT and for .
org.dita-semia.pdf
This plug-in helps to demonstrate the effect of the features. It highlights the content that was generated by in the preprocess phase. In a real document, the generated content looks like any other content. org.dita-semia.pdf also compensates for bugs in DITA-OT. Until version 2.2.1, DITA-OT cannot handle embedded SVG content properly. 's that generate SVG content are not displayed correctly with the standard pdf2 transtype.
